title: Skill
description: Represents this creatures ability to accomplish a task within a certain domain.

modifier.description: The value to apply to rolls made against this skill.

stat.description: The stat associated with this skill. Usually only one, but some skills can be rolls against different stats.

passive.description: The value for this skill that can be compared to a challenge DC without rolling. Usually 10 + mod, but sometimes modified other ways.

proficient.description: Is the creature trained or otherwise proficient in the use of this skill?
